content: RTK 1 (English: Radio Television of Kosovo 1, Albanian: Radio Televizioni i KosovÃ«s 1), is a public TV Channel in Pristina, Kosovo, providing news and shows. As part of the Radio Television of Kosovo (RTK), a public service broadcaster, RTK 1 produces and airs newscasts, sports updates and talk shows of interest to Kosovo viewers. RTK 1 airs in all of the territory of Kosovo.
